chat.content: Welcome! How can I assist you today? If you have any questions about Abhi's services or need guidance, feel free to ask.

Barah-e-karam mujhay aur tafseel se btayein ke aap ko kis tarah ki mushkil ka samna hai? Agar aap ne Abhi app ke through koi raqam nikali hai aur woh abhi tak aap ke account mein mojood nahi hai, to is ke liye aap ko pareshan hone ki zarurat nahi. Ye rahi aap ke liye madadgar maloomat:

1. Agar raqam nikalne ki transaction failed ho jaye to:
   - Aap ki raqam Abhi app ke wallet mein wapas ajaye gi.
   
2. Agar transaction in progress ya qued hai:
   - Aksar ye masla 24 ghantay ke andar hal ho jata hai aur raqam app ke wallet mein wapas aa jati hai.

3. Agar transaction completed hai magar raqam mojood nahi:
   - Aap ke account number ki tasdeeq karein. Agar account number durust hai aur phir bhi raqam nahi mili to customer support ya operations team ko complain bhejein.

Agar aap upar di gayi maloomat se mutmain nahi hain ya koi aur issue hai to, barah-e-karam ham se is email address (connect@abhi.com.pk) ya phone number (+923041115276) par rabta karein takay hum aap ki mukammal madad kar sakein. Aur agar possible ho to masla paish karne walay screenshot ya error message ke saath hamen tafseel se aagah karein. Shukriya!

Mujhe maazrat chahiye, lekin main aapko aapke balance ki maloomat nahi de sakta. Aapko Abhi app download karna hoga, ya agar pehle se install hai to ussi mein login karke apne home screen par apna available balance dekhna hoga. 

Agar aap ko login karte waqt ya balance check karne mein koi masla paish araha hai, to barah-e-karam Abhi customer support se is email address (connect@abhi.com.pk) ya phone number (+923041115276) ke zariye rabta karein. Aap humein apna naam aur phone number bhi provide kar sakte hain, aur hum aapko agle 24 ghanton ke andar rabta karenge. Shukriya!
اسلام علیکم مجھے پوچھنا دائیںgive very short answser
وعلیکم السلام! براہ کرم اپنا سوال بتائیں۔
Hello! How can I assist you today? If you have any questions or need support with Abhi's services, please let me know.
میں تنخواہ کیسے نکال سکتا ہوں ایپ سےgive very short answser
ابھی ایپ سے تنخواہ نکالنے کے لیے ایپ ڈاؤنلوڈ کریں، لاگ ان کریں، 'نکالو ابھی' پر کلک کریں، رقم درج کریں، اور تصدیق کریں۔
